value.title: Introduction to Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

value.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
value.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

value.title: Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Erich Robinson-Tillenburg joins Scott Hanselman to demo and explain health monitoring and configuration analysis for Azure Load Balancer using Azure Monitor for Networks, a central hub that provides access to health and connectivity monitoring for all your network resources.  0:00 – Overview 1:16 – Load
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qfzOTNKYTgU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines? Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how ACR can manage your images and even build them for you in the cloud.   0:00 – Overview
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VcZH6AWhUGk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 1: Describe core Azure concepts
value.excerpt: This learning path provides you with an introduction to the basics of Azure cloud computing and Azure architecture.

value.title: Discuss Azure fundamental concepts
value.excerpt: Learn about the different types and categories of cloud computing.

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 2: Describe core Azure services
value.excerpt: This learning path provides you with an introduction to the basics of Azure's core services for compute, network, storage, and database.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Explore Azure database and analytics services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the database services that are available on Microsoft Azure, such as Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, as well as big data and analytics.

topItems.title: Explore Azure compute services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different services that are available in Azure Compute.

topItems.title: Explore Azure Storage services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different storage options that are available in Azure Storage.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 3: Describe core solutions and management tools on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose the best services from Azure to build and manage cloud solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Choose the best AI service for your needs
topItems.excerpt: Examine Azure's AI services, and choose the right one for your company.

topItems.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft tools and services that help developers and operations engineers build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

topItems.title: Choose the best monitoring service for visibility, insight, and mitigation of service outages
topItems.excerpt: Discover solutions that help IT organizations with insights into the health and performance of their applications running in the cloud.

value.title: Architect infrastructure operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor, analyze, and manage the ongoing operation of your infrastructure in Azure.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Implement resource management security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to secure resources using policy, role-based access control, and other Azure services

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 5: Describe identity, governance, privacy, and compliance features
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you secure access to cloud resources, what it means to build a cloud governance strategy, and how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Secure access to your applications by using Azure identity services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), multifactor authentication, and Conditional Access can help you manage and secure identities on Azure.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Examine privacy, compliance, and data protection standards on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft's commitment to privacy, how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards, and additional considerations government agencies need to make.

value.title: Manage identity and access in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with subscriptions, users, and groups by configuring Microsoft Azure Active Directory for workloads.

value.excerpt: Explore essential Azure concepts to find out how virtual machines, containers, and apps combined with serverless computing services can fortify your business.

value.title: Get started with artificial intelligence on Azure
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers amazing new solutions and experiences; and Microsoft Azure provides easy to use services to help you get started.

topItems.title: Get started with AI on Azure
topItems.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.
